description: Returns a branch for an Amplify app.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: branchArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a branch that is part of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: branchName
nested_items.description: The name for the branch that is part of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the branch that is part of an Amplify app.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: stage
nested_items.description: The current stage for the branch that is part of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name for the branch. This is used as the default domain prefix.

nested_items.name: enableNotification
nested_items.description: Enables notifications for a branch that is part of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when Amplify created the branch.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp for the last updated time for a branch.

nested_items.name: environmentVariables
nested_items.description: The environment variables specific to a branch of an Amplify app.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: enableAutoBuild
nested_items.description: Enables auto-building on push for a branch of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: enableSkewProtection
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the skew protection feature is enabled for the branch.

nested_items.name: customDomains
nested_items.description: The custom domains for a branch of an Amplify app.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: framework
nested_items.description: The framework for a branch of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: activeJobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the active job for a branch of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: totalNumberOfJobs
nested_items.description: The total number of jobs that are part of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: enableBasicAuth
nested_items.description: Enables basic authorization for a branch of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: enablePerformanceMode
nested_items.description: Enables performance mode for the branch.

nested_items.name: thumbnailUrl
nested_items.description: The thumbnail URL for the branch of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: basicAuthCredentials
nested_items.description: The basic authorization credentials for a branch of an Amplify app. You must base64-encode the authorization credentials and provide them in the format user:password.

nested_items.name: buildSpec
nested_items.description: The build specification (build spec) content for the branch of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: ttl
nested_items.description: The content Time to Live (TTL) for the website in seconds.

nested_items.name: associatedResources
nested_items.description: A list of custom resources that are linked to this branch.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: enablePullRequestPreview
nested_items.description: Enables pull request previews for the branch.

nested_items.name: pullRequestEnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The Amplify environment name for the pull request.

nested_items.name: destinationBranch
nested_items.description: The destination branch if the branch is a pull request branch.

nested_items.name: sourceBranch
nested_items.description: The source branch if the branch is a pull request branch.

nested_items.name: backendEnvironmentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a backend environment that is part of an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: stackArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the CloudFormation stack.

nested_items.name: computeRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role for a branch of an SSR app. The Compute role allows the Amplify Hosting compute service to securely access specific Amazon Web Services resources based on the role's permissions. For more information about the SSR Compute role, see Adding an SSR Compute role in the Amplify User Guide.
